#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

<code>
<EFieldAction v0="1.0" e0="1.0" component="z" a="0.25"/>
</code>

Either provide <tt>v0</tt> or <tt>e0</tt>. If <tt>v0</tt> is not provided, then <tt>v0=-e0*Lz</tt>.

==FixedNodeAction==
<code>
<FixedNodeAction species="eup" model="SHONodes" temperature="1 Ha"/>
</code>

Attributes:
  * <tt>model</tt>
  ** "FreeNodes" (default)
  ** "SHONodes"
  ** "WireNodes"
  ** "GSSNode" or "GroundStateSNode"
  * <tt>species</tt>
  * double <tt>temperature</tt>
  * bool <tt>noNodalAction</tt>
  * bool <tt>useUpdates</tt>

==SHODotAction==
<code>
<SHODotAction thickness="10 nm" v0="100 meV" k="0"/>
</code>


==TwoQDAction==
<code>
<TwoQDAction omega="12 meV" d="50 nm" alpha="1.0"/>
</code>
